title: Product Designer
overview: The Product Designer will advocate for the customer experience, collaborate cross-functionally, set design requirements, deliver high-quality designs/prototypes, and bring new ideas to improve design quality at Educative. They should have 3+ years of experience, a design degree or relevant experience, familiarity with UX research, and proven experience in all phases of the design process.
